description: This PHP source file implements the web UI for the second step in the device's home network setup wizard. It displays current Wi-Fi configuration options for both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands, manages user input validation, dynamically enables/disables form elements based on device state, and handles the submission of updated Wi-Fi settings to the server.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends the updated Wi-Fi configuration to the server-side handler via AJAX and displays success or error messages based on the response.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Prepares Wi-Fi settings data from the form, serializes it into JSON, and calls set_config to submit the changes.
